text: is a Japanese J2 League football club based in Nagasaki. The club was founded in 1985 as "Ariake FC" till they merged with "Kunimi FC" in 2005 and adopted the name they still hold today. ==League position== *2009 : Football League - 11th *2010 : Football League - 5th *2011 : Football League - 5th *2012 : Football League - 1st *2013 : J2 League - 6th *2014 : J2 League - 14th *2015 : J2 League - 6th *2016 : J2 League - 15th *2017 : J2 League - 2nd *2018 : J1 League - 18th *2019 : J2 League - 12th *2020 : J2 League - 3rd == Other websites == * Official Website Category:2005 establishments in Japan Category:Japanese football clubs Category:Nagasaki Prefecture
title: V-Varen Nagasaki
